entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10 except minus 6 along parts of the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10 except minus 6 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023
